bibl.title: New Greek Fragments of Biblical Manuscripts in the Chester Beatty Library.
bibl.note: Édition de P. Chester Beatty No. XVII: Luc 14:7-14, VI/VII p.C. - Addition de nouveaux fragments à P. Chester Beatty Nos V, VI, XII, XIII, XVIII (= P. Chester Beatty IV-V, App. A) et à P. Bodmer XX.
Pietersma Albert, New Greek Fragments of Biblical Manuscripts in the Chester Beatty Library.
